summary: Increases the duration of the Rested, Well-Rested and Lover\'s Comfort bonuses to 16 hours instead of 8.
descriptionHtml:
Description

This mod increases the duration of the Rested, Well-Rested and Lover\'s Comfort bonuses to 16 hours instead of 8.  I wanted to feel like I could adventure all day without stopping to sleep in order to recover my leveling bonus.  Why not make it a permanent bonus?  Well, I still want some incentive to go to sleep.

Prerequisites:
Skyrim

Conflicts:
Any other mod that changes rested bonuses.
author: tmbroe01
